mapper.insert:
SELECT TB_OD01M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_OD01M01 ( CO_CD, REQ_DT, CLNT_CD, ORDRG_SEQ, PRJCT_CD, MAKR_CD,
TYP_CD, OWNER_CD, IMP_YN, SALES_AREA_CD, SELL_CLNT_CD, MNG_TEL, DLVR_DTTM,
DIRTRS_YN, ADDR_ZIP, ADDR_MAIN, ADDR_SUB, ORDRG_RMK,
TRANS_AMT, ODR_SEQ,
SALES_MNG, ORDRG_YN,
CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{coCd}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd'), ${clntCd}, ${ordrgSeq}, ${prjctCd}, #{makrCd},
#{typCd}, #{ownerCd}, #{impYn}, #{salesAreaCd}, #{sellClntCd}, #{mngTel}, #{dlvrDttm},
#{dirtrsYn}, #{addrZip}, #{addrMain}, #{addrSub}, #{ordrgRmk},
#{transAmt}, #{odrSeq},
#{salesMng}, 'N',
#{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE )
